nodes.text: VZ-19 was an astromech droid of the Galactic Republic posted as a merchant in Anchorhead on Tatooine during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire.

VZ-19 appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Tatooine. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, VZ-19 was removed from the game along with the rest of the Modification Commendations Vendors. VZ-19's position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
